summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the reassessment and reassessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 795, for the improvement of Seattle Boulevard, from Plummer Street to 9th Avenue South, and Massachusetts Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a 24-foot plank roadway and a 6 foot sidewalk, in accordance with established grades of said boulevards and avenues, as provided by Ordinance No. 9777, under Ordinance No. 32908 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
